1.title: The Nura Clan's Third Awakens

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Having lost his father at an early age, young Rikuo Nura aspires to become the Supreme Commander of yokai just like his grandfather and late father did.

2.title: Two Justices

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Ryuji Keikain and Mamiru Keikain, two onmyoji who are powerful enough to take down even Aotabo, have arrived in Ukiyoe Town.

3.title: Yura's Realization

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Ryuji Keikain uses his Shikigami "Gyogen" to attack Rikuo, who defends himself with his blade. Ryuji halts his attack when he recognizes the blade as "Nenekirimaru," a Spirit Blade that can only cut down yokai.

4.title: Nurarihyon and Princess Yo

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: During the era when the Toyotomi Clan ruled Japan, there lived a young woman known as Princess Yo, who could heal any wound or disease with her magical powers.

5.title: Towards Today

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Nurarihyon enters Osaka Castle to rescue Princess Yo from Hagoromo-Gitsune.

6.title: The Legends of Tono

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Kiyotsugu proposes that the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol members visit Yura's home in Kyoto as part of a summer yokai research project.

7.title: Kyokasuigetsu

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: At Oshu-Tono's Hidden Village, Rikuo spends his days in intense training.

8.title: Hagoromo-Gitsune Kyoto Invasion

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: In Kyoto, the Keikain seals are broken one after another by Hagoromo-Gitsune.

9.title: The Grey Onmyoji

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Rikuo completes his training and returns to Ukiyoe Town with the Tono yokai. Seeing the progress his grandson has made, Nurarihyon allows Rikuo to go to Kyoto.

10.title: Hagun

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Yura and Ryuji are forced to fight Akifusa.

11.title: Battle Above Kyoto

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: The Kyoto yokai are moments away from fulfilling their long-standing wish with only one seal remaining to break. Meanwhile, Rikuo and his clan members on board the Treasure Ship are about to enter Kyoto

12.title: Long Standing Wish

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: The Nura Clan's Treasure Ship sustains heavy damage by the Kyoto yokai and begins to lose altitude.

13.title: The Destiny of the Demon Capital

episode of.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: A look back on past events as the Nura Clan, Tono yokai, and Keikain onmyoji get ready for their upcoming showdown.

imdb.plot outline: At first glance, Nura Rikuo seems like nothing more than a normal middle-schooler. In actual fact, he is grandson of Nurarihyon, master of a youkai clan. Having only recently resolved the hostilities between the Nura Clan and the Shikoku Yokai, Rikuo finds no rest as an ancient enemy of the Nura Clan, Haguromo-Gitsune, resurfaces. After 400 years of inactivity, Haguromo-Gitsune suddenly sweeps through Kyoto with overwhelming power.
imdb.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital
akas: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital (Japan)
plot: At first glance, Nura Rikuo seems like nothing more than a normal middle-schooler. In actual fact, he is grandson of Nurarihyon, master of a youkai clan. Having only recently resolved the hostilities between the Nura Clan and the Shikoku Yokai, Rikuo finds no rest as an ancient enemy of the Nura Clan, Haguromo-Gitsune, resurfaces. After 400 years of inactivity, Haguromo-Gitsune suddenly sweeps through Kyoto with overwhelming power.::Shakti Prasanna Mishra

Rikuo Nura attends middle school by day and then comes home to a house full of "youkai" demons, being the grandson of Nuraihyon, who is master and leader of youkai clan, also known and feared through out all youkai. Rikuo is 1/4 part youkai (demon) which has caused some issues with a lot of the other youkai clans, one problem is Rikuo can only changes into his youkai self at night and with his grandfather nominating him to be the leader of the clan has really stirred things up. Rikuo lost hid father at a very young age, to only find out he was murdered, and now the culprit is coming for Rikuo, not to mention The Exorcist who are trying to get rid of all youkai, to say he has his hands full would be a understatement, action, comedy and more awaits the viewer.::mwg-06601
